summary.p: This single leaf contains a frament from the end of the story of Sadāprarudita, "Ever Weeping", a Buddhist monk who learns the prajñāpāramitā from the bodhisattva Dharmodgata. The manuscript breaks off just as Sadāprarudita himself becomes a bodhisattva. Although the story of Sadāprarudita is extant in a number of texts in the prajñāpāramitā genre, this version is from the Aṣṭasāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā, specifically its 31st chapter.
This manuscript was previously catalogued as fragment de dhāraṇī en écriture rañja by Jean Filliozat.
